hackathon-description-text: Want to make something cool for Charity? Whether you have never seen a single line of code before, or whether you've used technology your whole life, if you want to do something to make a real difference, then Charitech is the place to be!
hackathon-requirements:
There are no official rules with regards to what your project is allowed to be, however, all teams should aim to create a project which can tackle a real world issue. 
Challenges have been set by charities which we have invited and are available at charitech.hackersatcambridge.com. If you have another idea that you want to take forward then you are more than welcome to go rogue and work on that.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The funds raised at the following link will be donated to the charity of choice of the winning team. Our aim is to raise a total of £500 during the event.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=William Gates Building, 15 J J Thomson Ave, Cambridge CB3 0FD, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does the project effectively tackle the problem which it sets out to solve. Does it have a future?

hackathon-location-address: William Gates Building, 15 J J Thomson Ave, Cambridge CB3 0FD, UK
